headline: Citi’s Simon Hales Reiterates Bullish View on Philip Morris (PM) Growth Outlook
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is included among the 14 Best Low Volatility Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 10, Citi analyst Simon Hales raised his price recommendation on Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) to $210 from $200. The analyst reiterated a Buy rating on the stock. The analyst’s update reflects continued confidence in […]

headline: Can Altria's Marlboro Brand Power Sustain Its Market Share?
summary: MO faces pressure as the U.S. cigarette market shrinks, testing Marlboro's ability to hold share and sustain profitability.
